metadata.title: CVE-2023-38886 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in Dolibarr ERP CRM v.17.0.1 and before allows a remote privilegedattacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted command/script.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
